name: Otherside (Celo Aragao)
description:
A simple arcade game made using C++ and RayLib

Dodge projectiles and use your area attack to destroy your enemies! Your area attack spawn relative to your movement speed! Try dashing and attacking for increased range strikes!

Arrow Keys / Left Joystick Axis = Move Arround

A Key / A = Attack

S Key / X = Dash

Enter / Start = Restart

Song: Linus Akesson - A Mind Is Born

You can find the source code here!
